name: Plus Adventure
description:
plus adventure

the BNHA RPG project! fantasy AU feat. dungeon crawling , turn-based battle, and visual-novel style story. free, currently developing Chapter 1!

===

very first PROOF OF CONCEPT prototype!

in this version, we show you our quest structure, random dungeon crawling, and battle! it's only been 11 days since the announcement of this project! thanks to the 100+ people who have joined us , especially our artists, writers, composers, game designers, and MVPs, you know who you are!

===

it's team effort, get involved through Discord! 

totally open. DM me on discord melissa#6127 for an invite, or dig out the link on the project's (work in progress) tumblr.

thanks corsev, naina, kazehita, chara, and mistake for the little portraits used in this version! can't wait to get everyone's work incorporated!

thanks bruno for the hometown (the first scene) and dungeon music! thanks nokisoup for the battle music! thanks iroz for the sword room (very last scene) music!

HOW TO PLAY: for right now, it's all click-based! click around to travel to different locations, talk, etc. first, take a few quests from the quest board, the grassy rectangle in the first scene.

NOTE TO MAC USERS: if it says you can't play because you've downloaded this from the internet, go to your security settings and say open anyway.

very first prototype. sorry for spelling errors, and artifacts of debugging. it's in its ugly duckling stage!
